front.div:
METHYLAL
Drawn up : S.TH-P; S.CTC
4
General , Use
Methylal is an oxygenated solvent-type diether. The product is used in the chemical synthesis industry as
reactant for chlormethylation, methoximethylation, for organo-magnesian products, in cosmetics and
perfumes industry, in the dye and varnish industry as solvent, in the building industry, in the pharmaceutics
industry, in polymer resins synthesis, in the adhesives industry, and in the extraction processes, as fuels
additive to improve the octane number and to reduce the pollution degree of exhaust gases.
Quality Requirements
